name: Infinite Breadsticks!
description:
Have you ever been to one of those restaurants that advertises an unreasonable amount of breadsticks? You finish the ones on your table and before you can even ask for more, your server's already behind you with more. Is there a such thing as TOO many breadsticks?

Click anywhere on the screen to get a breadstick. How many breadsticks can you get?

Infinite Breadsticks! was created in Unreal Engine. It is free to download, but you can donate to support the developer.
